subject: Leadership
title: First Principles Thinking
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on First Principles Thinking.

hook.text: Elon Musk was told rockets cost $65 million. He broke the cost into raw materials: $2 million. SpaceX was born.

buildup.text: First principles thinking breaks problems down to their fundamental truths and rebuilds solutions from scratch.

discovery.text: Most people reason by analogy: 'It's always been done this way.' First principles ask: 'What must be true?'

twist.text: It's slow and mentally exhausting. That's why most people avoid itâ€”and why those who use it gain massive advantages.

climax.text: Apply it by asking: what do I know for certain? What am I assuming? What would I build if I started from zero?

punchline.text: Convention tells you what exists. First principles reveal what's possible.

quiz.question: What does first principles thinking involve?
